Digital Marketing Manager

Inside Sales Consultant

Digital Marketing Manager

Location: San Diego

About the job:

Doctible is a tech company, but what we do ultimately affects people's health and their wallets. We are looking for a stellar Digital Marketing Manager. You will take the reins and acquire new leads and customers through online PPC, CPA, content distribution, retargeting campaigns and whatever secret sauce you can bring to the table. This role will be in charge of implementing and scaling online acquisition marketing, managing the strategy, execution, and optimization across channels.

You understand the importance of building a portfolio of channels to maximize ROI and how to quickly turn the dials on them to hit company objectives. You're smart about testing and not afraid of trying new things, quickly interpreting the results and in the end, adding new channels to the mix the build the next big contributor to the program.

Other key characteristics would be: self-motivated, passionate and ready to prove themselves to become part of the leadership team and shape the companyâ€™s future. While we have a great team, we all wear multiple hats ... there will be times where you will need to be a designer, page builder, web engineer, form builder & content writer. You're hands on, make no excuses, and love it.

About You:

  • 2-3 (or more) years of experience in digital marketing (B2C).
  • In-depth knowledge of the various digital marketing channels and technologies, including paid search (Google AdWords), retargeting, social network advertising (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and more), and content distribution and placement networks.
  • Conversion expertise, with in depth knowledge of funnel tactics, and pushing aggressive tests through via Optimizely, Unbounce, or another equivalent.
  • Aptitude for online analysis, campaign development, campaign optimization and reporting campaign results. Read: you live in excel and love to dig into trends.
  • Prior experience in Healthcare or Health Insurance industry is beneficial, but not required.

To Apply:

Please send cover letter and your resume to careers@doctible.com. We'd love to learn more about you!

Inside Sales Consultant

Location: San Diego

About Doctible:

Doctible is a fast growing, venture backed technology company within the exciting and rapidly evolving healthcare IT market. We have an amazing team that transforming the way people find and engage healthcare providers, like doctors, chiropractors and dentists to name a few. We are looking for sharp, effective salespeople to join are team at our sweet downtown location!

Why work at Doctible?

You will be part of a company that is changing an industry and a dynamic team that has direct impact on sales and your pocketbook. We are focused on your success. Doctible is committed to our employees and the results from your efforts show immediately. Work/Play balance. While we work hard, we also break it up with happy hours, lunches, ping pong or pool competitions and outside events to build the best team possible.

What you'll be doing:

You are part of the company's front line, contacting healthcare providers and introducing them to Doctible's products and innovative online healthcare network. Develop and manage your leads within full sales cycle from prospecting to, demos and closing the deal. Need help at any point? We are there for you. Providing feedback on what's working and what's not. Your experience and input matters as your input is built into the company's future sales processes.

Who we are looking for:

  • 1-3 years sales experience in outbound sales environment, retail, door-to-door.
  • Minimum of 6 months outbound phone sales.
  • Proven, natural sales ability with high performance numbers.
  • Friendly, professional, and confident on the phone.
  • History of meeting and exceeding sales goals.
  • Understanding of online or digital marketing concepts.
  • Experience selling to healthcare providers or healthcare industry a big plus.

What we are offering:

  • A competitive compensation package with potential $38K to $50K your first year, upside is uncapped.
  • Fun work environment, great team, super location and unlimited potential.
  • Sales support, we want you to succeed!
  • Paid time off including 9 paid holidays.
  • Downtown parking paid.
  • Health Insurance.
  • Stock options!!

If you think you are a great fit, then contact us and let us know why!

Please send cover letter and your resume to careers@doctible.com. We'd love to learn more about you!
